name: Motivated Reasoning
description:
You can reason your way into believing things that are NOT real. That is what Motivated Reasoning is about.

This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1 in 1.5 days by  two people; Vastini and Melon Mouse Games.

In the hour after the jam, we fixed a few bugs. This non-jam version can be found here: https://melonmouse.itch.io/motivated-reasoning-post-jam-version

Check out Vastinis page:
https://vastini.itch.io/
